# requiredAuthorizations

**Type Property**

The authorization types you need to use the camera frame provider.

## Declaration

```swift
static var requiredAuthorizations: [ARKitSession.AuthorizationType] { get }
```

## Instance properties

- **isSupported**: A Boolean value that indicates whether this device supports the camera frame provider.
